title: Kokaku Torimonochou
alternative_title: こかくとりものちょう ; 胡鶴捕物帳 ; Kokaku Torimono chou ; Kotsuru Torimono Chou ; Red Hot Chili Samurai ; Utsuru Torimonochou
status: こかくとりものちょう ; 胡鶴捕物帳 ; Kokaku Torimono chou ; Kotsuru Torimono Chou ; Red Hot Chili Samurai ; Utsuru Torimonochou
description:
Description :
        From iskultrip Scans: Kokaku is a flashy, casual dressing samurai. He's always laying around, but he has no compassion for the wicked! Sneaking into gambling dens and pavilions and beating up the baddies...On top of that, how far would he go for his beloved chile peppers!? The first part of this fire breathing action packed hero's tale!!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1 : Book Of Kotobuki Crane
